reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, yet Elegant!
reviews.reviewText: These hand engraved crafted letters are very exquisite. They're just what you're looking for in a minimalist, professional, simple, and yet elegant card. My only wish is that there were more in the pack or a bit cheaper. $19 for 10 is ridiculous. The card is small, so if you're wanting to write a lot in it then this is not the card for you. If you want to simply say thanks and give a brief explanation on why you're thankful then this is a good card. The cards are really nice, I just wish my handwriting was better. It kind of ruins the card if you do not have good penmanship. I have horrid chicken scratch handwriting and wish I would have just typed a letter onto fancy paper. The quality of the letter and envelope is nice, you can tell from the texture. I am giving this 5 stars because I would love to receive a letter like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use these thank you cards when you are trying to impress the recipient
reviews.reviewText: These are some of the highest quality cards that I have found, especially for this price point. Although the price point might seem high, around $2 per card, this is a lot less than some of the other high end thank you cards go for, and you are not sacrificing quality with these cards. I have used these cards in situations where I need a professional and eloquent thank you note. The cards themselves are very simple. The paper is very thick and high quality. The envelopes are also very thick and high quality. The design on the interior of the envelopes is not over the top, and it adds a little bit of flare to the note.If you are looking for a thank you card that is really going to impress the recipient, these are for you! You should never underestimate the power of a strong, professional thank you card!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lives up to Expectations
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fan of Crane stationary in general but these are beautiful. They shipped really quickly and I'm pleased with the quality. I previously bought the pale green ecru cards and was disappointed that Crane no longer carries them. These are simple yet elegant. The gold embossing looks better than in the pictures and the detail on the envelope is subtle but classy. The paper is thicker and shows its great quality. I'd highly recommend. Another excellent product from Crane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are my "go to" thank you notes
reviews.reviewText: I like quality thank-you notes that leave an impact and these are the ones I use. I've gone through five packs of these now, using them in both professional and personal settings. The paper is beautiful, the quality is exceptional...these are tough to beat for any professional use. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank you note cards that leave a sincere impression
reviews.reviewText: These thank you cards have been my go-to for sending personalized thank you notes. The paper weight is significant along with the decorative lining, these features alone will guarantee that the recipient will know you are sincere with the thank you.I traditionally use gel pens so note that the paper takes time to absorb all the ink. I have noticed that felt markers (sharpies) seem to write the cleanest on these cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely first class stationery. It makes me feel very confident that my thank you is sincere and well written.Only one recommendation (to the purchaser not the manufacturer) - you need to write out a quick draft of what you want to say because if you make a mistake on these thank you notes, it's quite expensive to throw it away! But worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful cards, overpriced
reviews.reviewText: Lovely finish and the blue and ivory extends a bit to the back of the card as well. I suppose it was worth about $20 because of the brand and overall classiness of the card (I purchased as follow-up thank you cards for job interviews) but for only 10 cards it's really not a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recently went through residency interviews and I used these ...
reviews.reviewText: I recently went through residency interviews and I used these as my Thank You cards. The price to some may seem steep, but you can really feel the weight and quality of the paper. It shows, you put some thought into the card, and that you have a keen attention to detail. I ended up getting the residency of my choice and although I'm sure this card wasn't the sole reason, never disregard the impression details can have on a person. Regardless of what you need these cards for, I'm sure they will serve your purpose well.
